5931.quoteText: We use Digital Ocean Inc. (101 Avenue of the Americas 10th Floor, New York, NY 10013, United States of America) as a service provider to host our server infrastructure. We use OVH GmbH, Dudweiler Landstraße 5, 66123 Saarbrücken, Germany to ensure our service availability. While we are currently hosting our services in Frankfurt, Germany, we may expand to other server locations offered by our hosting service providers in order to ensure the reliablity and performance of our service around the world.
5931.title: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

tosdr.case: Many third parties are involved in operating the service

5932.quoteText: We may update this privacy policy in the future. If we make any material changes we will notify you by email (using the email address stored in your account) or by displaying a notice banner on our site before the changes become effective. We encourage you to review the privacy policy periodically to ensure you are aware of the latest information.
5932.title: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

tosdr.case: Users should revisit the terms periodically, although in case of material changes, the service will notify

5933.quoteText: You retain ownership of and responsibility for content you create even if it does not belong to you.

5934.quoteText:
Deleting an account terminates these Agreements, but grants us an indefinite license for content you collaborated to the service (e.g.
event pages).
This ensures that we can continue to provide this content beyond the termination of the Agreements.
5934.title: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

tosdr.case: This service holds onto content that you've deleted

5935.quoteText: We reserve the right to delete your account at any time.
5935.title: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

tosdr.case: The service can delete your account without prior notice and without a reason

5936.quoteText:
If you terminate an account before your active subscription expires, you will not be entitled to a refund, even partial.
Subscriptions are billed in advance on a monthly basis and are non-refundable.
We will not offer refunds or credits for partial months of service.
5936.title: The service has a no refund policy

tosdr.case: The service has a no refund policy
